member.name: P:KzSystem.KzData.BooleanType
member.summary: Boolean : True 或 False

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzData.ByteType
member.summary: Byte : 1 个字节，0 到 255（无符号）

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzData.CharType
member.summary: Char : 2 个字节，0 到 65,535（无符号）

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzData.DateTimeType
member.summary: DateTime : 8 个字节，0001 年 1 月 1 日午夜 0:00:00 到 9999 年 12 月 31 日晚上 11:59:59 。

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzData.ObjectType
member.summary: Object（类） : 4 个字节（32 位平台上） or 8 个字节（64 位平台上）， 任何类型都可以存储在 Object 类型的变量中

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzData.SByteType
member.summary: SByte : 1 个字节，-128 到 127（有符号）

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzData.StringType
member.summary: String（类） : 取决于实现平台，0 到大约 20 亿个 Unicode 字符

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzData.UShortType
member.summary: UInt16 : 2 个字节，0 到 65,535（无符号）

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzData.BigIntegerType
member.summary: 表示任意大的带符号整数。这是支持任意大整数的非基元整型类型。

member.name: M:KzSystem.KzColorHelper.GetColorName(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Return a color name in KnownColorName else in Hex string.

member.name: M:KzSystem.KzColorHelper.GetColorByName(System.String)
member.summary: Return a color by name string both a KnownColorName and a Hex string.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzDirectoryTreeView.ShowAllDirectories
member.summary: 指示是否顯示全系統的資料夾樹形結構，True：全部顯示；False：從指定的分支開始顯示。

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzDirectoryTreeView.StartDirectory
member.summary: 指定樹形結構的開始資料夾，用以創建路徑起點。 如 ShowAllDirectories 設為 True，本屬性將失效。

member.name: M:KzSystem.KzFileListView.OnItemActivate(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the base class OnItemActivate event handler. Extends the base class implementation to run any .exe or file with an associated executable.

member.name: M:KzSystem.KzFileListView.ShowFiles(System.String)
member.summary: This subroutine is used to display a list of all files in the directory currently selected by the user from the custom TreeView control.

member.name: M:KzSystem.DirectoryScanner.DirectoryScanner_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Load event for the DirectoryScanner.

member.name: M:KzSystem.DirectoryScanner.AddToListView(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This subroutine adds the strSubDirectory that the user selects on the TreeView to the ListView, and sets the text, size, and color.

member.name: M:KzSystem.DirectoryScanner.GetSizeColor(System.String)
member.summary: This subroutine returns a Color based on the combined size of the directory and all its subdirectories. This is one of two overloads.

member.name: M:KzSystem.DirectoryScanner.GetSizeColor(System.Int64)
member.summary: This function returns a Color based on the combined size of the directory and all its subdirectories. This is the second of two overloads.

member.name: M:KzSystem.DirectoryScanner.GetDirectorySize(System.String,KzSystem.DirectoryNode)
member.summary: This function returns the size of a directory, and all its sub-directories.

member.name: M:KzSystem.DirectoryScanner.ShowSubDirectories(KzSystem.DirectoryNode)
member.summary: When a directory node is expanded, add its subdirectories to the ListView.

member.name: M:KzSystem.DirectoryScanner.exitToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Close the application

member.name: M:KzSystem.DirectoryScanner.TreeView1_AfterExpand(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the AfterExpand event for the TreeView, which does not occur after the TreeView is selected, but after the application decides that the user's attempt to expand the node should be allowed. The corresponding BeforeExpand event handler is used for this decision making, if desired. All Before events pass a TreeViewCancelEventArgs object that contains a Cancel property. This property can be used for vetoing the user's action. Thus, the "AfterExpand" event could rightly be named "AfterExpandApproval".

member.name: M:KzSystem.DirectoryScanner.TreeView1_AfterSelect(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the AfterSelect event for the TreeView, which does not occur after the TreeView is selected, but after the application decides that the user's attempt to select the node should be allowed. The corresponding BeforeSelect event handler is used for this decision making, if desired. All Before events pass a TreeViewCancelEventArgs object that contains a Cancel property. This property can be used for vetoing the user's action. Thus, the "AfterSelect" event could rightly be named "AfterSelectApproval".

member.name: T:KzSystem.KzFlatSides
member.summary: KzSystem 定制針對方形對象之「邊」的描述

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.None
member.summary: 未指定

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.All
member.summary: 四邊皆有

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.Top
member.summary: 上邊

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.Bottom
member.summary: 下邊

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.Left
member.summary: 左邊

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.Right
member.summary: 右邊

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.Horizontal
member.summary: 水平兩邊，即 Left and Right

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.Vertical
member.summary: 垂直兩邊，即 Top and Bottom

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.LeftTop
member.summary: 左邊及上邊，等同於 TopLeft，可用於描畫順序之區別

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.TopLeft
member.summary: 上邊及左邊，等同於 LeftTop，可用於描畫順序之區別

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.RightTop
member.summary: 右邊及上邊，等同於 TopRight，可用於描畫順序之區別

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.TopRight
member.summary: 上邊及右邊，等同於 RightTop，可用於描畫順序之區別

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.LeftBottom
member.summary: 左邊及下邊，等同於 BottomLeft，可用於描畫順序之區別

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.BottomLeft
member.summary: 下邊及左邊，等同於 BottomLeft，可用於描畫順序之區別

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.RightBottom
member.summary: 右邊及下邊，等同於 BottomRight，可用於描畫順序之區別

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatSides.BottomRight
member.summary: 下邊及右邊，等同於 RightBottom，可用於描畫順序之區別

member.name: T:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners
member.summary: KzSystem 定制針對方形對象之「角」的描述

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.None
member.summary: 未設定

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.All
member.summary: 四角皆有

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.LeftTop
member.summary: 左上角，等同於 TopLeft

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.TopLeft
member.summary: 左上角，等同於 LeftTop

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.RightTop
member.summary: 右上角，等同於 TopRight

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.TopRight
member.summary: 右上角，等同於 RightTop

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.LeftBottom
member.summary: 左下角，等同於 BottomLeft

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.BottomLeft
member.summary: 左下角，等同於 LeftBottom

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.RightBottom
member.summary: 右上角，等同於 BottomRight

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.BottomRight
member.summary: 右上角，等同於 RightBottom

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.Top
member.summary: 上方兩角，即 TopLeft + TopRight

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.Left
member.summary: 左方兩角，即 TopLeft + LeftBottom

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.Right
member.summary: 右方兩角，即 TopRight + RightBottom

member.name: F:KzSystem.KzFlatCorners.Bottom
member.summary: 下方兩角，即 LeftBottom + RightBottom

summary.para: KzTrackBar represents an advanced track bar that is very better than the standard trackbar.

KzTrackBar supports the following features:
MAC style, Office2003 style, IDE2003 style and Plain style.
Vertical and Horizontal trackbar.
Supports many Text Tick styles: None, TopLeft, BottomRight, Both. You can change Text Font, ForeColor.
Supports many Tick styles: None, TopLeft, BottomRight, Both.
You can change , , .
You can change and .
You can change and .
Easy to Use and Integrate in Visual Studio .NET.
100% compatible to the standard control in VS.NET.
100% managed code.
No coding RAD component.

member.name: E:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.ValueChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the property Value has been changed.

member.name: E:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.Scroll
member.summary: Occurs when either a mouse or keyboard action moves the slider.

member.name: M:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor method of class

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.AutoSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height or width of the track bar is being automatically sized.
member.remarks: You can set the AutoSize property to true to cause the track bar to adjust either its height or width, depending on orientation, to ensure that the control uses only the required amount of space.
member.value: true if the track bar is being automatically sized; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.LargeChange
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the slider is moved a large distance.
member.remarks: When the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN key or clicks the track bar on either side of the slider, the property changes according to the value set in the property. You might consider setting the value to a percentage of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) values. This keeps the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size.
member.value: A numeric value. The default value is 2.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.SmallChange
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the slider is moved a small distance.
member.remarks: When the user presses one of the arrow keys, the property changes according to the value set in the SmallChange property. You might consider setting the value to a percentage of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) values. This keeps the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size.
member.value: A numeric value. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.TrackLineHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of track line.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.TickColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the tick's of the control.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.TickFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the delta between ticks drawn on the control.
member.remarks: For a with a large range of values between the and the , it might be impractical to draw all the ticks for values on the control. For example, if you have a control with a range of 100, passing in a value of five here causes the control to draw 20 ticks. In this case, each tick represents five units in the range of values.
member.value: The numeric value representing the delta between ticks. The default is 1.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.TickHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of tick.
member.value: The height of tick in pixels. The default value is 2.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.IndentHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of indent (or Padding-Y).
member.value: The height of indent in pixels. The default value is 6.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.IndentWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of indent (or Padding-Y).
member.value: The width of indent in pixels. The default value is 6.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.TrackerSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker's size. The tracker's width must be greater or equal to tracker's height.
member.value: The object that represents the height and width of the tracker in pixels.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.TextTickStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the text tick style of the trackbar. There are 4 styles for selection: None, TopLeft, BottomRight, Both.
member.remarks: You can use the , properties to customize the tick text.
member.value: One of the values. The default is BottomRight.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.TickStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the tick style of the trackbar. There are 4 styles for selection: None, TopLeft, BottomRight, Both.
member.remarks: You can use the , , properties to customize the trackbar's ticks.
member.value: One of the values. The default is BottomRight.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.TrackerColor
member.summary: Gets or set tracker's color.
member.value: You can change size of tracker by property. A that represents the color of the tracker.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets a numeric value that represents the current position of the slider on the track bar.
member.remarks: The Value property contains the number that represents the current position of the slider on the track bar.
member.value: A numeric value that is within the and range. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.Minimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the lower limit of the range this is working with.
member.remarks: You can use the method to set both the and properties at the same time.
member.value: The minimum value for the . The default value is 0.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the upper limit of the range this is working with.
member.remarks: You can use the method to set both the and properties at the same time.
member.value: The maximum value for the . The default value is 10.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the track bar.
member.remarks: When the Orientation property is set to Orientation.Horizontal, the slider moves from left to right as the increases. When the Orientation property is set to Orientation.Vertical, the slider moves from bottom to top as the increases.
member.value: One of the values. The default value is Horizontal.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.BorderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the border type of the trackbar control.
member.value: A that represents the border type of the trackbar control. The default is KzBorderStyle.None.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color of the control.
member.value: A object that represents the border color of the control.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.TrackLineColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the track line.
member.value: A object that represents the color of the track line.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.FitSize
member.summary: Gets the Size of area need for drawing.

member.name: P:KzSystem.KzTrackBar.TrackerRect
member.summary: Gets the rectangle containing the tracker.
